project.name: Y3U4L4-TCP
project.notes: This is a simulation of the Transmission Control Protocol. There are only two nodes on the network, and their "IP addresses" are "Alice" and "Bob." Transmissions are divided into packets of length one character.

block.l: Click on one of us to send a message.

var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), hats = []; if (message !== '') { stage.lastMessage = message; process.getObjectsNamed(spriteName, this, stage).forEach(function (morph) { hats = hats.concat(morph.allHatBlocksFor(message)); }); hats.forEach(function (block) { stage.threads.startProcess(block, stage.isThreadSafe); }); }
